All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationFrame
The main frame of the application.
Author
Represents an author with basic details and a set of books.
AuthorEntity
 
AuthorNotFoundException
An exception that is thrown when an Author is not found in the repository.
AuthorRepository
A repository for managing Authors.
AuthorSidePanel
A panel that displays the details of an Author and allows the user to delete it.
AuthorsScreen
Screen displaying a table of Authors and a side panel for adding and removing authors.
AuthorsTableModel
A table model for displaying Authors in a JTable.
BaseRepository<T,D,E>
A base repository class that provides basic CRUD operations for entities.
Book
Represents a book with its details, author, and associated loans.
BookAlreadyBorrowedException
Exception thrown when a Book is already borrowed.
BookEntity
 
BookNotFoundException
An exception that is thrown when a Book is not found in the repository.
BookRepository
A repository for Books.
BookSidePanel
A panel that displays the details of a Book and allows the user to delete it.
BooksScreen
A panel that displays a table of Books and allows the user to add and remove books.
BooksTableModel
A table model for displaying Books in a JTable.
BooksTableModel.FilterOption
An enum representing the filter options for the table model.
DatabaseAuthorRepository
Hibernate implementation of the AuthorRepository interface.
DatabaseBookRepository
Hibernate implementation of the BookRepository interface.
DatabaseMemberRepository
A database implementation of the MemberRepository interface.
DatabaseModule
A Dagger module that provides database-related dependencies.
DatabaseRepositoryModule
A Dagger module that binds the JPA implementations of the repositories to the interfaces.
DatabaseSeeder
A utility class for seeding the database with initial data.
DateFieldKeyAdapter
Implementation of a KeyAdapter that restricts the input of a JTextField to a date format.
InMemoryAuthorRepository
An in-memory implementation of the AuthorRepository interface.
InMemoryBookRepository
An in-memory implementation of the BookRepository interface.
InMemoryLoanRepository
An in-memory implementation of the LoanRepository interface.
InMemoryMemberRepository
An in-memory implementation of the MemberRepository interface.
JpaAuthorRepository
JPA implementation of the AuthorRepository interface.
JpaBookRepository
JPA implementation of the BookRepository interface.
JpaLoanRepository
JPA implementation of the LoanRepository interface.
JpaMemberRepository
JPA implementation of the MemberRepository interface.
LayoutChanger
A functional interface for changing the layout of the main window.
Loan
Represents a loan of a book to a member with details about the loan and return dates.
LoanEntity
 
LoanNotFoundException
An exception that is thrown when a Loan is not found in the repository.
LoanRepository
A repository for managing Loans.
Main
 
Member
Represents a member with basic details such as name, email, and the date they joined.
MemberEntity
 
MemberNotFoundException
An exception that is thrown when a Member is not found in the repository.
MemberRepository
A repository for managing Members.
MembersScreen
A panel that displays a table of Members and allows the user to delete them.
MembersSidePanel
A panel that displays the details of a Member and allows the user to delete it.
MembersTableModel
A table model for displaying Members in a JTable.
MembersTableModel.FilterOption
An enumeration of the possible filter options for the table.
MenuBar
A menu bar extending JMenuBar for the application.
RepositoryFactory
A Dagger component that provides repositories and an entity manager.
Screens
Constants for the names of the screens used for navigation.
UserSettings
 
UserSettings.StorageMode
